short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide LinkedIn posts based on specified keywords and names.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Make your LinkedIn feed cleaner and more relevant by hiding posts based on specific keywords and names. With LinkedIn Content Hider, you have control over the content you see, letting you say "Buhbye Cringe" to posts that don’t add value to your feed.

Features:

- Keyword Blocking: Instantly hide posts containing specific keywords you’d prefer not to see.
- Name Blocking: Hide posts by certain people, decluttering your feed and helping you focus on content that matters.
- Simple to Use: Add and remove keywords or names easily from the extension popup interface.
- Customizable: Tailor your LinkedIn experience by creating a personal list of blocked content.

Whether you’re trying to stay productive, avoid irrelevant content, or focus on meaningful updates, LinkedIn Content Hider is the ideal tool to refine your LinkedIn experience.

Permissions: The extension requires permissions to access your LinkedIn feed to identify and hide posts based on your preferences. No data is stored or shared.

Privacy Policy: Your privacy is important! LinkedIn Content Hider does not collect, store, or share any personal information.

Download LinkedIn Content Hider today and take control of your LinkedIn feed!
